excerpt: "Robustel's latest IoT device the EG5120 5G Edge Computing Gateway is now listed in the Microsoft Azure certified device catalogue and also Amazon Web Services (AWS) IoT Greengrass. The EG5120 helps to seamlessly extend Azure & AWS based IoT cloud services and intelligence to the network edge,"
